translation.disclamerMessage1: Do you confirm that the provided details are correct and that you wish to submit the application?
translation.disclamerMessage2: In case of core wards [south, east + west zones], the existing A-katha properties will be issued A-katha upon submission of UpToDate information of existing owners along with their Aadhaar etc. Registered deed and other supporting documents are optional.
translation.disclamerMessage3: In case of any additional owner or change in name etc., registered deed or other supporting documents are mandatory.
translation.disclamerMessage4: In case of MAR 19 properties for old ULBs merged with BBMP, the relevant MAR 19 register scan must be cited for approval of A-katha.
translation.disclamerMessage5: In case old GP properties either eswathu registration of Form 9 or original Form 9 scan of register of GP is mandatory for A-katha.
translation.disclamerMessage6: In every other case, registered deed or allotment by govt Authority Agency with conversion of other approvals by KTCP Act 1961 is mandatory for A-katha.
translation.disclamerMessage7: Properties on Govt lands / rajakaluve / lakes / etc. will not get final ekatha in general.
translation.disclamerMessage11: 'A' & 'B' Khatha is being issued as per existing BBMP property Tax Records & subject to final verification as per my submitted documents.
translation.disclamerMessage12: In case of any discrepancy between existing BBMP records & my submitted information or missing information, my case will be referred to the jurisdictional ARO for decision on merit.
translation.disclamerMessage13: Any eKhatha on government or government organization land is liable to be rejected or cancelled.
translation.disclamerMessage14: Any wrongful or incorrect eKhatha issued is liable to be cancelled.
translation.disclamerMessage8: I Certify that information submitted is true & correct to the best of my knowledge & belief and any false or wrong information makes eKhatha liable to be cancelled & make me liable for criminal/suitableaction as per law.

declaration.first_title: 1. 'A' & 'B' Khatha is being issued as per existing BBMP property Tax records & subject to final verification as per my submitted documents.
declaration.second_title: 2. In case of any discrepancy between existing BBMP records & my submitted infomration or missing information, my case will be referred to the jurisdictional ARo for decision on merit.
declaration.third_title: 3. Any eKhatha on government or government organization land is liable to be rejected or cancelled.
declaration.fourth_title: 4. Any wrongful or incorrect eKhatha issued is liable to be cancelled.
declaration.second_checkbox: I certify that information submitted is true & correct to the best of my knowledge & belief and any false or wrong information makes eKhatha liable to be cancelled & make me liable for criminal/suitable action as per law.
